greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n gives coefficients of expansion of Product_{k = 1..n-1} ((n + 1)*x + k), starting with lowest power.
comment: Related to Stirling numbers A008275, A008277.
link: Peter Bala, Fractional iteration of a series inversion operator
Jean-Christophe Novelli and Jean-Yves Thibon, Duplicial algebras and Lagrange inversion, arXiv preprint arXiv:1209.5959 [math.CO], 2012.
formula: The function F(x,t) := 1 + t*A(x,t) has several nice properties:
F(x,t) = 1/x*Revert( x*(1 - x)^t ) = 1 + t*x + t*(1 + 3*t)*x^2/2! + t*(2 + 12*t + 16*t^2)*x^3/3! + ..., where Revert denotes the series reversion operator with respect to x.
maple: seq(seq(coeff(mul((n+1)*t + k, k = 1..n-1), t, i), i = 0..n-1), n = 1 .. 10); # _Peter Bala_, Nov 16 2015
seq(print(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n-1)), n=1..8); # _Peter Luschny_, Mar 01 2021
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 29 2012
